metadata.title: CVE-2023-31794 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: MuPDF v1.21.1 was discovered to contain an infinite recursion in thecomponent pdf_mark_list_push. This vulnerability allows attackers to causea Denial of Service (DoS) via a crafted PDF file.

criterions.comment: mupdf: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
